textBeforeTable: Model Measurements Size & Fit Length: 15in / 38cm MEASUREMENTS Made in the USA. Dry clean. Trim: 97% viscose/3% spandex. Shell: 100% polyester. Fabric: Sequined mesh. A crush of low-gloss sequins lends a subtle luster to this figure-hugging skirt. A soft jersey waistband offers a comfortable fit, and a hidden zip closes the side. Lined. textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer Founded by Sharon Lebon in 1995, Three Dots clothing is based on a simple idea: to create the perfect tee with great fabrics, inspired design, and fastidious construction and fit. Though this is still the very soul of the company, Three Dots has grown into a complete clothing collection. Based in LA, Three Dots lends itself to easy, comfortable layering pieces you never want to take off. A favorite of Hollywood starlets and NYC editors, Three Dots is more than just a fashion collection - it's a lifestyle. See all Three Dots reviews Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details
